## Required:

- [A First Course in Bayesian Statistical Methods](https://www.amazon.com/Bayesian-Statistical-Methods-Springer-Statistics/dp/0387922997) by Peter D. Hoff.:
    + Section 5.3: Joint inference for the mean and variance
    + Section 5.4: Bias, variance and mean squared error
    + Section 5.5: Prior specification based on expectations
    + Section 5.7: Discussion and further references

## Optional:

- [Bayesian Data Analysis (Third Edition)](http://www.amazon.com/Bayesian-Analysis-Chapman-Statistical-Science/dp/1439840954/) by Andrew Gelman, John Carlin, Hal Stern, David Dunson, Aki Vehtari, and Donald Rubin.:
    + Section 3.1: Averaging over 'nuisance' parameters
    + Section 3.2: Normal data with noninformative prior distribution
    + Section 3.3: Normal data with a conjugate prior distribution
